engine_datatransfer_base.title: Data Transfer Base
engine_datatransfer_base.description: Data Transfer Engine configuration schema. Configuration for all DataTransfer engine implementations inherit from this one

name.description: Name of the datapack for transfer

network.description: Trigger, if the datapack should be sent to network

file.description: Trigger, if the datapack should be sent to file

dataDirectory.description: Path to the storage of file streams.

streamDataPackMessage.description: if true the engine will stream DataPackMessages, if false it will stream their contained data
